metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9539 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description:
tools/tiffcrop.c in libtiff 4.0.6 has an out-of-bounds read inreadContigTilesIntoBuffer(). Reported as MSVR 35092.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9539` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6').
